TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acts as a source of Fresh Water
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acts as a source of Fresh Water
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acts as a source of Fresh Water
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acts as a source of Fresh Water

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities cannot be founded near Fresh Water
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les Villes ne peuvent être fondées près des sources d'humidité
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities cannot be founded near Fresh Water
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities cannot be founded near Fresh Water
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities cannot be founded near Fresh Water

TEXT.English: unless they are near Fresh Water
TEXT.French: sauf si elles sont à proximité d'humidité
TEXT.German: unless they are near Fresh Water
TEXT.Italian: unless they are near Fresh Water
TEXT.Spanish: unless they are near Fresh Water

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Adds Fresh Water in a %d1 tile radius
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]procure de l'humidité dans un rayon de %d1 cases
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Adds Fresh Water in a %d1 tile radius
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Adds Fresh Water in a %d1 tile radius
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Adds Fresh Water in a %d1 tile radius

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ne peut être construit près de sources d'humidité
